pageProduct.name: The Hemp Company Daily Cleansing Shampoo 300ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Shampoo for hair

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. Not for internal use

Common Uses

To shampoo and cleanse hair

Directions

Apply a small amount of this lightweight shampoo and gently massage into wet hair until a rich lather forms. Rinse well. Repeat. The Hemp Company Daily Cleansing Shampoo can be used as frequently as desired to cleanse, and condition hair leaving it soft and nourished.
